section.6: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Ramadan

hadiths.text: Khaithamah reported that 'Abd Allah b. 'Amr said:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said to me: Recite the Qur'an in one month. I said: I have (more) energy. He said: Recite it in three days Abu 'Ali said: I heard Abu Dawud say: I heard Ahmad b. Hanbal say: The narrator 'Isa b. Shadhan is a sane person
